name: Hunter Monster Scary Forest
description:
Hunter Monster Scary Forest is one of the fps monster games, that takes you to a wilderness, crawling with deadly enemies and filled with the hardship of savage survival. Our adventure games offer to take part in a new survival experiment! A wild island in the middle of the ocean full of ferocious mutants and you’re left alone to survive on an island by all means.
Features:
- Intense gameplay consisting monster hunting missions
- Unlock an arsenal of powerful weapons to help you stay alive
- Huge open world environment in northern forests of medieval town
- Intuitive controls for dangerous monster fighting
- Immersive 3D graphics and amazing sounds
